nodes.text: The Wentrion Gaps were a location where the Separatist Alliance had once operated but experienced issues regarding a lack of supplies. When the New Republic faced a similar problem in the weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Lieutenant Yrica Quell compared the Republic's situation to the Separatists' supply issues in the Wentrion Gaps when discussing the former matter with General Hera Syndulla aboard the Acclamator-class transgalactic military assault ship Lodestar.
The Wentrion Gaps were mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, the first volume of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy written by Alexander Freed.
